If.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(Colors.MediumPurple, "[Profile Message!]: ", Colors.Yellow, "Please stand by as the functions are being activated!");

PickUp.QuestName: In the Rear With the Gear

TurnIn.QuestName: In the Rear With the Gear

PickUp.QuestName: Free Your Mind, the Rest Follows

TurnIn.QuestName: Free Your Mind, the Rest Follows

Code.Code: foreach (var aura in new[]{768,783,5487,2645,24858}.Select(id => Me.GetAuraById(id)).Where(a => a != null)) aura.TryCancelAura();

Code.TerminateWhen: Unit(41112) == null || Unit(41112, u => u.IsFriendly) != null
Unit(41112) == null || Unit(41112, u => u.IsHostile) != null

Code.Code: foreach (var aura in new[]{768,783,5487,2645,24858}.Select(id => Me.GetAuraById(id)).Where(a => a != null)) aura.TryCancelAura();

Code.UseWhen: Me.CurrentTarget != null && Me.CurrentTarget.Entry == 41031 && Me.BagItems.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Entry == 55883).CooldownTimeLeft == TimeSpan.Zero && Me.CurrentTarget.HasAura(77224)
Me.CurrentTarget != null && Me.CurrentTarget.Entry == 41255 && Me.CurrentTarget.HasAura(77355) && Unit(41287) == null

PickUp.QuestName: The Time for Mercy has Passed

TurnIn.QuestName: The Time for Mercy has Passed

Code.UseWhen: Unit(41614, u => u.CastingSpellId == 77777) != null && Unit(41581, u => u.CreatedByUnit == Me) != null && !Me.HasAura(77770)

PickUp.QuestName: Mental Training: Speaking the Truth to Power

TurnIn.QuestName: Mental Training: Speaking the Truth to Power

PickUp.QuestName: Spiritual Training: Mercy is for the Weak

TurnIn.QuestName: Spiritual Training: Mercy is for the Weak

Code.Button1Phrase2: Yea... I don't know about this.
Code.Button3Phrase1: it's like the void just touched my mind
Code.Button3Phrase2: The end is a new beginning!

Code.TerminateWhen: Unit(40999) == null || Unit(40998) == null || Unit(40998, u => u.HealthPercent < 50) != null
